sense.def:
To exclude something from an activity or discussion
pomeni namenoma ne vključiti nečesa v dejavnost ali pogovor.

seg.quote: The retail prices index, excluding housing costs, rose by 646.6 per cent.

sense.def:
To exclude a possibility
pomeni zavrniti neko možnost.

seg.quote: A fake call from some local phone box was not excluded.

sense.def:
To exclude someone from a place or activity
pomeni preprečiti, da bi nekdo nekam vstopil ali sodeloval pri neki dejavnosti.

seg.quote: ...jobs from which the majority of workers are excluded.
